entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
